title: Education & Training
subtitle: Academic qualifications and internationally recognized safety certifications

education.description: Studied computer systems, programming, and database management with practical knowledge in digital safety tools and automation.
Holds multiple internationally recognized safety certifications including NEBOSH IGC, IOSH Managing Safely, OSHA Safety & Health, Fire Safety, First Aid, Work at Height, and Risk Assessment Training.
Comprehensive training in computer fundamentals, networking, software development, and AI-based web and app solutions.
